alert.note: Alert for Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 11:30AM EDT until May 06 at 9:18PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers... Raccoon Creek near Granville. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Raccoon Creek near Granville. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Portions of the TJ Evans bike trail are nearly flooded, with out buildings near the Granville Water Plant flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EDT Friday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 13.6 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
